text: Iván Patricio Eugenio Manns de Folliot (3 August 1937 – 25 September 2021) was a Chilean singer, composer, writer, poet, novelist, essayist, play writer and journalist. He was critic of dictator Augusto Pinochet. Manns was sent in exile for his criticism. Manns died of heart failure in Concón, Chile on 25 September 2021, at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Chilean singers Category:Chilean activists Category:Chilean playwrights Category:Chilean journalists Category:Essayists Category:Chilean composers Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Chilean musicians
title: Patricio Manns
